title: EXTENDED OFFICIAL TRAILER American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: Yep, its confirmed. Murder house characters will appear in two, three episodes tops, the ones that will show us Michael's past and how he rose to power. As for the witches, I'm hoping they get at least a bit more than a few episodes. They were my favorite.
Hopefully Papa Legba will make an appearance.
I like the look of this. It has an almost medieval, dystopian feel to it and it looks like it's going back to it's old roots. Dark stuff.

I feel like I'm seeing heavy links with Cult in this & possibly links (although weaker) with Hotel & Asylum. This has the potential to be the most cerebral series yet. I hope it exceeds my expectations! ♥
Drink everytime someone’s throat is cut. Seems to be thee main death in AHS 😅
